titles: The danger of deferring repentance discovered by that reverend and faithfull minister of the word, William Fenner.
author: Fenner, William, 1600-1640.
publisher: Printed for Jo. Stafford and are to be sold by Richard Burton,
notes: Caption title: A sermon of Mr. William Fenners at Maidstone, September 25, 1629.
